alert.note: Alert for Lee; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:23PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pontotoc and southwestern Lee Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pontotoc, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Pontotoc, Verona, Trace State Park, Shannon, Troy, Furrs, Algoma, Chiwapa, Palmetto, Bissell, Chesterville, Flowerdale, Rough Edge, Old Union, Wallfield and George P Cossar State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
